title: FPS capped at 60
body:
my FPS has been capped at 60 for a month or two, i then turned off game mode and it got fixed, a couple of days later it went back to 60FPS and i cant seem to find a solution to this problem.


* My laptop is an HP Omen and its running windows 10

any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by game mode, the xbox bar?  You might be capping your framerate through your in-game video options, definitely check that option out when you get a chance.  Keep in mind that you may run into issues if you decide to uncap it.  Our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide may help as well in case your frame drops are being caused by driver issues or bad game files.  I hope that helps!
yeah i meant the xbox bar, all my ingame settings are fine but im still not sure why its capped
